scripts.version: yarn config set version-git-tag false && yarn workspace cx-portal version --new-version $npm_package_version && yarn
scripts.build:sources: cp yarn.lock cx-portal | zip -r portal-frontend.zip cx-portal*/src package.json **/package.json yarn.lock cx-portal/yarn.lock -x '*.stories.*' -x '*.test.*' -x '*mock*' -x '*.ttf' -x '*.svg' -x '*.png'
scripts.build:docker: if [ -d "./cx-portal/build" ]; then yarn build:docker:prebuilt; else yarn build:docker:full; fi
scripts.publish:docker: IMAGE=$npm_package_config_image && docker tag $IMAGE:latest $IMAGE:$npm_package_version && docker push $IMAGE:$npm_package_version && docker push $IMAGE:latest
